publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4289 Ross Finnie: Celebrate Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire’s 10th Anniversary—That the Parliament celebrates the 10th anniversary of children’s charity Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire, formerly called Youthbuild, the project that enables disadvantaged young people from Renfrewshire’s most deprived communities to access sustainable employment, and congratulates all who have successfully run the project, including Barnardo’s, Renfrewshire Council and the local employers, and the young people themselves who have been helped into employment through the programme.

S3M-4289 Celebrate Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire’s 10th Anniversary (lodged on 1 June 2009) Robin Harper*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Sandra White*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Mike Pringle*, Jackie Baillie*, Jim Tolson*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Wilson*, Trish Godman*
S3M-4289 Celebrate Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire’s 10th Anniversary (lodged on 1 June 2009) Des McNulty*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-4289 Celebrate Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire’s 10th Anniversary (lodged on 1 June 2009) Hugh Henry*

S3M-4289 Ross Finnie: Celebrate Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire’s 10th Anniversary—That the Parliament celebrates the 10th anniversary of children’s charity Barnardo’s Works Renfrewshire, formerly called Youthbuild, the project that enables disadvantaged young people from Renfrewshire’s most deprived communities to access sustainable employment, and congratulates all who have successfully run the project, including Barnardo’s, Renfrewshire Council and local employers, and the young people themselves who have been helped into employment through the programme. Supported by: Robin Harper, Ms Wendy Alexander, Ken Macintosh, Kenneth Gibson, Jackson Carlaw, Sandra White, Hugh O’Donnell, Mike Pringle, Jackie Baillie, Jim Tolson, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Stuart McMillan, Bill Wilson, Trish Godman, Des McNulty, Jamie Hepburn, Hugh Henry, Jack McConnell*
